head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGOWAN, WILLIAM J., S.J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGOWAN, WILLIAM J., S.J.

block.p: McGOWAN--William J., S.J. on April 29. Beloved brother of Mary Sprague, Peg Schuhle, Jim, Rita Sheehan, and Kathleen McGowan. Reposing at the Xavier High School 30 W. 16 St., NY on Wednesday from 2-5 and 79pm and Thursday from 25pm. Mass of Christian burial will be held at St. Francis Xavier Church, 30 W. 16 St., on Thursday at 7:30pm. Interment will take place at the Jesuit Martyrs Shrine, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations to Murray-Weigel Hall 515 E. Fordham Rd., Bronx, NY 10458 would be appreciated by the family. For further information contact Farenga Bros. Inc., Directors 718-654-0500.
